post.body: I got a kick out of the grammar list, too! Lol!
My big pet peeve: When they're are people who use there words improperly. So their. Lol!
I think it's great everyone was serenaded on Metro this morning! I'm jealous!!
You still haven't started Christmas shopping?? Are you a Christmas Even type of shopper? :-p
Haha! I be you're right!!!
Lol! But I also will randomly listen to Christmas music throughout the entire year. Yes, I am that girl :-p
I never think Christmas music rots your brain! If fact, I think it's good for you! :)
My #firstfollow was @newmediajim :)
You've been a travelin' fool recently!!
They just change so much! Hopefully I'll see them again in March...that's not too bad.
Oh no! I'm glad nobody was hurt but that stinks! I'm sorry :(
I've had Cingular and Sprint in the past, so I def would like to stay with Verizon! Did you leave it?
I'm at the same phone crossroads, but my problem is that I love Verizon :-/
I haven't read Outliers...you'll have to let me know if it's any good!
How was your Christmas?
I enjoyed Blink....have you read The Tipping Point too?
I'm watching Baby TV....aka my 8 week old niece :)
9 Easy Steps to Longer Sentences: Lol! http://www.plainlanguage.gov/examples/humor/9easysteps.cfm
Guy on Price is Right guessed the Showcase Showdown down to the dollar!!! First time in 36 years!! http://tinyurl.com/565ud4
Haha! How to Write Good: http://www.plainlanguage.gov/examples/humor/writegood.cfm
Mark Twains on Plain English: Aafte sam 20 iers ov orxogrefkl riform, wi wud hev alojikl, kohirnt speling in ius xrewawt xe Ingliy-spiki ...
No big surprise here...Time magazine names Obama as Person of the Year: http://tinyurl.com/5gntk2
Santa gets a ticket for double parking while delivering toys to kids! Really??? http://tinyurl.com/5mmb3w
A child with the name Adolph Hitler was denied a bday cake...I think his parents are nuts, but feel sorry for their kids :( http://tinyu ...
Good morning tweeps!!!
Hanging out with Chloe and Walt...about to watch Heroes!!
Alrighty tweeps, I'm leaving now, going home to change, then trying to get some X-Mas shopping done!!!
Too funny! RT @lenejohansen: The Onion: $700 Billion Bailout Celebrated With Lavish $800 Billion Executive Party http://is.gd/c1vq
I'm kind of sad...I just got a couple more pics of my niece/nephew and it makes me realize how much I'm missing with them :(
America's Most Wanted host John Walsh: Police have finally closed the books on his son's murder: http://tinyurl.com/6ys3dc
Hello KC!!!
My flight is delayed...sigh...
Just boarded the plane! My mom will be waiting at the other end...I haven't seen her since July so I can't wait!
The party at my sis's place last night: about 30 people and 20 empty bottles of wine. Wow.
At DIA flying to MCI....I'm not a fan of getting up at 4 a.m....
I had to say goodbye to my 2 y/o nephew and 8 week old niece tonight since I won't see them in the a.m. Not afraid to admit I cried :(
Good morning! My sis's father-in-law turns 70 & they're having about 30 people over. So I'm cooking today! And playing w/my nephew & niece:)
I hope everyone had a wonderful Christmas!!
Highlight of my day: My nephew feeding me milk from his sippy cup and my niece who spit up on me :) I love these kids!!
I hope everyone has a fabulous and merry day! I won't be online much b/c I want this time for my family :)
